abstract: NHL Roundup; Pittsburgh Penguins defeat New York Islanders, 3-2; other scores and news noted.
snippet: Evgeni Malkin’s shootout goal capped a rally from a two-goal deficit in the third period.
lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin’s shootout goal capped a rally from a two-goal deficit in the third period.

headline.main: Penguins Beat Isles; Flyers Yield Nine Goals
